verses.text: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* meeting-place \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w judging|strong="H8199"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* go \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w judging|strong="H8199"\w* falsely, having \w respect|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* persons \w of|strong="H6440"\w* evil-doers? (\w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.)

\w Give|strong="H6663"\w* ear to \w the|strong="H8199"\w* cause \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w children|strong="H3490"\w* without fathers; let those \w who|strong="H6041"\w* \w are|strong="H8199"\w* troubled \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w in|strong="H6041"\w* need have their \w rights|strong="H1800"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* saviour \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* those \w who|strong="H7563"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* nothing: \w take|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* evil-doers.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* sense; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dark: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bases \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w moved|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*; \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Most High:

\w But|strong="H0403"\w* \w you|strong="H0403"\w* \w will|strong="H0120"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w like|strong="H4191"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, \w falling|strong="H5307"\w* \w like|strong="H4191"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* earth.

\w Up|strong="H6965"\w*! \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w come|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* heritage.
